QuestData.Title: Deluge Dilemma
QuestData.Description:
Elementals are killing the hornstriders! I know how to wrangle large critters, but I never thought I'd have to go toe-to-toe with an elemental! These aren't anything like baby thunder lizards...
<Dazakros sighs, distressed.>
Please knock down a few of them elementals. Hornstriders have a lot more sense than we give them credit for. They'll fight back if they have the means to!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Water Elementals in Overflowing Rapids.
